import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from 'src/app/models/product.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-product', templateUrl: './add-product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-product.component.css'] }) export class AddProductComponent { newProduct: Product = { id: '', name: '', type: '', color: '', price: 0 }; }
